text: Kugcineni ukuzila ixesha eliziintsuku eziliqela ezimiselweyo, kodwa ukuba ubani kuni uye wagula okanye abe seluhambeni, ezo ntsuku aziphosileyo kofuneka aphinde azizile kwakhona. Ke kwabo bathi bazile phantsi kobunzima61 kukubo ukuba bakhethe ukuzila okanye bondle amahlwempu. Ke lowo wenza ubulungisa ngokuzithandela, kolunga kakhulu kuye. Ukuzila yeyona nto ilungileyo kuni ukuba benisazi
